preconditions.precondition: Farmer initiates a call to the VoxMeteo Sahel System

mainSequence.step: System greets the Farmer with a voice prompt ("Welcome to VoxMeteo Sahel System, select language")
Farmer selects their preferred language (1 for English, 2 for French, 3 for local languages)
System confirms the Farmer's language selection
User navigates to the Main Menu after language selection
